description.value:
Frequency once per round

Requirements You're holding an unloaded hand crossbow.

You can fire off a single shot even when unprepared. You Interact to reload your hand crossbow and Strike with it.

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Repeating Hand Crossbow Training]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Training} feat, you can use this feat with a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Repeating Hand Crossbow]{Repeating Hand Crossbow} to load either a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Bolts]{Bolt} or a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Repeating Hand Crossbow Magazine]{Repeating Hand Crossbow Magazine}, but the speed means you can fire only one bolt, then the magazine jams. You must spend a 3-action Interact activity to remove the jammed magazine and clear it before it can be used again.
